sect1.title: Alias usage
sect1.para: In cases where code generation is not an option, alias objects can be used as path references for expression construction. They can be used via proxied Java Bean objects through getter method invocations.

To use the alias functionality in your code, add the following two imports
sect1.programlisting: import static com.querydsl.core.alias.Alias.$; import static com.querydsl.core.alias.Alias.alias;
